Posts.Content: Karen7359 wrote: I've always worn underwire bras. March 21 I had my right breast removed and my left breast, I was a size 34D, being unsupported is causing terrible backaches and poor posture. Is there anything to lift the remaining breast as an underwire would have? Thank you. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Remaining breast hurts my back without a bra. Karen7359 Denise-G

Posts.Content: Apr 4, 2018 09:18PM Karen7359 wrote: Good morning, Denise! Thank you for your response. I will look into a little heavier prosthesis, and the Amoena bras. I’m also going to check out your blog. I’m so sorry you, your mom and sister have had to take this journey, and I hope you are all doing well now. Thank you again, Kare
Posts.Title: Remaining breast hurts my back without a bra. Karen7359 Denise-G
